sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, Fragment, useRef } from "react"; import { MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardTitle, MDBCardText, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBCardGroup, MDBInput, MDBIcon } from "mdbreact"; import Style from "../css/CardStyle.module.css"; import RegisterModal from "./RegisterModal"; const EventsCreator = (state) => { // const { eventsArr } = state; const [modalIsOpen, setModalIsOpen] = useState(false); const [register, setRegister] = useState(false) const [data, setdata] = useState({ name: '', lastName: '', phoeNumber: '', email: '', address: '', school: '', curriculum: '', why: '', expectaions: '' }) const [errData, seterrData] = useState({ errName: 'חובה להזין שם', errLastName: 'חובה להזין שם משפחה', errPhoeNumber: 'חובה להזין מספר טלפון', errEmail: 'חובה להזין כתובת אימייל', errExpectaions: 'חובה להזין ציפיות למסע' }) // const [name, setName] = useState('') // const [lastname, setLastname] = useState('') // const [phoneNumber, setPhoneNumber] = useState('') // const [email, setEmail] = useState('') // const [adress, setName] = useState('') // const [adress, setAdress] = useState('') // const [school, setSchool] = useState('') // const [name, setName] = useState('') const imageRef = useRef(null); const titleRef = useRef(null); const desRef = useRef(null); const dateRef = useRef(null); const sendInfoHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() if(!event.target.className.contains('was-validated')) event.target.className+= ' was-validated' } function CreateCard(item) { titleRef.current = item.title; desRef.current = item.fullDesc; dateRef.current = item.date; imageRef.current = item.imageUrl; setModalIsOpen(true); } function SignModal(title) { //new setModalIsOpen(false) setRegister(true) } const cards = state.eventsArr.map((item, index) => { return ( {item.title}
{item.description} CreateCard(item)} > קרא/י עוד ); }); return ( {cards} setModalIsOpen(false)} style={{ overlay: { backgroundColor: "rgba(0,0,0,0.4)", }, }} > {titleRef.current}
{dateRef.current}
{desRef.current} SignModal(titleRef.current)} > הירשם setRegister(false)} style={{ overlay: { backgroundColor: "rgba(0,0,0,0.4)", }, }} >

הרשמה למסע

{titleRef.current}

{dateRef.current}

setdata({ ...data, name: e })} >
{errData.errName}
 setdata({ ...data, lastName: e })} >
{errData.errLastName}
 setdata({ ...data, phoneNumber: e })} >
{errData.phoeNumber}
 setdata({ ...data, email: e })} >
{errData.errEmail}
 setdata({ ...data, address: e })} > setdata({ ...data, school: e })} > setdata({ ...data, curriculum: e })} > setdata({ ...data, why: e })} > setdata({ ...data, expectaions: e })} >
{errData.errExpectaions}
שלח
) }; export default EventsCreator;
